text: Valérie Plante (born June 14, 1974) is a Canadian politician. She is the 45th and current Mayor of Montreal since 2017."Valérie Plante elected mayor of Montreal, beating out Denis Coderre". CBC News, November 5, 2017. She was first elected to Montreal City Council in 2013. Plante became leader of the Projet Montréal party in December 2016. Plante was born in Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec. She studied at Université de Montréal. ==References== Category:Mayors of Montreal Category:Living people Category:1974 births
title: Valérie Plante
